name: Farm To Cup
description:
How To Play:

Click on a item to move to and interact with it.

How To make Coffee

  1. Grab some beans in a marked create
  2. Place beans into grinder
  3. Pick up grinds, and place them into a coffee maker
  4. Make sure a coffee pot is in the coffee maker, and wait for coffee to be made!

How To Grow Beans

  1. Make sure the land you want to use is plowed( Use the farm tool to plow )
  2. Grab a seed
  3. Place in plowed land
  4. Wait till bush has some beans
  5. Harvest
  6. Place harvested beans back in crates in store
